ReleaseNotes.ReleaseNote: - Now compatible with MSFS 2024 - Some performance improvements
- Add support for helicopters added in Sim Update 11

- Add throttle-only mode - Add auto-hide title bar - Zero values are now grayed out in Simple Number Display - Fix behavior on saving PropMix option - Fix to prevent quick-hide while panel is externalized
- Now compatible with Sim Update 5 - Improve performance on updating SimVars by using new API

- Add config panel and auto-save config - Add simple and verbose number display - Add quick hide feature - Propeller/Mixture Bar will be automatically set for vanilla aircrafts in Standard edition - Lower the minimum size of the panel
